mapper.select: select IFNULL(sum(amount),0) from freezen_bill where bankid = #{bankid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and year =#{year} and (`order`=0)
select IFNULL(sum(amount),0) from freezen_bill where bankid = #{bankid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and year =#{year} and (`order`=1 or `order`=2)
